CustomField.formula: IF(AcctSeed__Days_Past_Due__c <=0, "0-Current", IF(AND(AcctSeed__Days_Past_Due__c>0,AcctSeed__Days_Past_Due__c<=30),"1-30 Days", IF(AND(AcctSeed__Days_Past_Due__c>30,AcctSeed__Days_Past_Due__c<=60),"31-60 Days", IF(AND(AcctSeed__Days_Past_Due__c>60,AcctSeed__Days_Past_Due__c<=90),"61-90 Days", IF(AcctSeed__Days_Past_Due__c>90,"Over 90 Days", "")))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Denotes the age of the billing for the given accounting period.
CustomField.label: Age
